rooms.description: Open-plan living space with ample natural light, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and minimalistic Bohemian decor.
Adjacent to the living room, designed for casual dining and social gatherings. Incorporates Bohemian art pieces and indoor plants.
Modern open kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, featuring an island counter. Bohemian elements are introduced through artisanal fixtures and natural materials.
Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows, a balcony for relaxation, Bohemian style decor, and ample storage.
Private bathroom for the master bedroom, incorporating sustainable fixtures and a serene ambiance.

openings.details: Large, unobstructed windows providing ample natural light and views of the cityscape.
Spacious balcony offering outdoor space and privacy.
Seamless access to the penthouse's rooftop terrace, designed for relaxation and gatherings.

levels.description: A fully furnished rooftop terrace with seating areas, an outdoor kitchenette, and lush greenery. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the North-East direction for prosperity.
